titleInfo.title: Distributional Coalitions in Nepal: An Essay on Democratization, Capture, and (Lack of) Confidence
Local Democracy in South Asia: Microprocesses of Democratization in Nepal and its Neighbours

bibliographicCitation.bio1:
Pfaff-Czarnecka J (2008)
Distributional Coalitions in Nepal: An Essay on Democratization, Capture, and (Lack of) Confidence.
In: Local Democracy in South Asia: Microprocesses of Democratization in Nepal and its Neighbours. Gellner DN, Hatchethu K (Eds); Governance, conflict and civic action series, 1. New Delhi: Sage: 71-104.
